channel.title: Posts on blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on blog

item.title: change
item.description:
9:48 AM

The moving machine is active; a kind gentleman named Tyrone Smith will be helping us move all our shed furniture to the house. This is going to be the start of a massive transition from my childhood home, onward to somewhere new and fresh.

item.title: normalcy
item.description:
What are we doing here?

So many things to decide for this blog moving forward. I guess we could call it determining normalcy. First of all, school is so boring. How I miss doing the multiple weekly essays for history, now all I have is a discussion or two a week on the bible. I am not a religious person, and I am not sure why this is a necessary for a university student to take it, but thankfully this is the last general education class I will have to take for this major. I am so tired.

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description:
What to say

I love the idea of this blog. A vast expanse where only my thoughts can swim. I am struggling with mental health now, but I am sure it will pass. It always passes. I can only focus on Simba, and the other few fully positive things in my life. I also have to focus on school, job hunting, and moving into the new house next week. I am currently 3 months into my journey of praying everyday, and there have only been a few slip ups.
